title: How to Unmute Notes from an Account on Instagram

steps.title: Launch the Instagram app on your smartphone.
steps.content: Launch the Instagram app on your smartphone. Log in to your account, if you haven't already done so.

steps.title: Go to the Instagram profile of the account you want to unmute.
steps.content: Go to the Instagram profile of the account you want to unmute. Tap the search box and search for their username to go to their profile.

steps.title: Tap on the Following v button.
steps.content: Tap on the Following v button. It will be located right after the “Message” button. This will open a menu panel with few options.

steps.title: Tap on Mute.
steps.content: Tap on Mute . It will be the third option on the list. This will lead you to the “Mute” settings.

steps.title: Unmute notes.
steps.content: Unmute notes. Tap on the blue switch next to the “Notes” text to unmute the notes. The blue switch will turn to grey, which means you are done. Once the user posts a note on their account, it will show up on your direct messages tab. That's it!
